title: Something needs to honestly be done about smurfs
body: Seriously there is nothing enjoyable about facing someone that has way more skill then you do. I don't care about the circumstance. In rank really all it does is demoralize a player.  You wonder why people are so toxic. That would be a part of the reason. Heres the result of a smurf. One the team mates give their team mate a hard time for dying so much. Not that they stood a chance to begin with and 2 its pretty much just boosting players on the smurfs team. And I really don't care how you try to spin this you don't see pro's playing high school or college players in any sport. Why because there is no entertainment value in it.

replies.body:
Sorry to break the news to you man but you are in bronze, where smurfs are basically non existent.

A new smurf account would have to tank many many losses on his account to get to your level, it just does not happen.

Good luck improving.

LOL.  

Are those really smurfs or people that are trying to lose?

None of my smurfs have been below gold.  Unless I am intentionally not trying on them so that I can play with bronze friends.  Which none of my friends even play anymore.  So lul.

"Smurfs start out in Iron."  PEOPLE HAVE TO TRY TO GET TO IRON.  I know a dude that had to lose like 15-20 games, from a 4/4 fresh account to get into iron.  


Every 2 games?  I can promise you that 33% of the players in bronze aren't smurfs.  At most 3-5% of the players in bronze are smurfs from gold and low plat.    And even less from high plat/ diamond.    So a total of like 6% of the bronze players are smurfs.  And that is being EXTREMELY generous.

If you want to know a real thing.  

Smurfs in Diamond.  That is a stupid high number, just think about all of the high elo streamers.  They all easily have 3 to 5 smurfs that they let decay to diamond, or get to diamond 1 and then swap to a d4 account.  You are almost going to run into a smurf every 5-10 games in diamond.    

If you don't want to deal with smurfs gain elo :)  Get to Challenger.  Then you don't ever have to deal with smurfs.

> 
> If you don't want to deal with smurfs gain elo :)  Get to Challenger.  Then you don't ever have to deal with smurfs.

You don't have to try hard to get a new account into iron.... Or at least you didnt. When I started ranked under the provisional role matchmaking system or whatever it was called, it put me in iron for like every single role except mid. I wasn't even losing all of my placements.

No.

All accounts are placed into silver 1/gold 4 upon their very first ranked game.

If you actually tested this you would know it is true.

umm that is not true i just made a new acct not too long ago it starts at bronze4 or 3 if i am not mistaken to fall under bronze is the problem i have like a 10% wr atm in bronze and i cant fall below bronze 2 lol lose 7 lp per lossgain 30 for a win.

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=xxx+stc

First 2 ranked games ever played. Gold 4.

You show me proof of an account starting in bronze, I will be waiting a long time lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=00000002000100010000,timestamp=2019-08-24T23:10:32.912+0000)

are u a smurf fanboy or something i dont get it lol its been an on going problem for a long time in not just league but a lot of multiplayer games.high elo try hard trolling low elo.why would they go to plat where them being a smurf doesnt really mean much?

Smurfs are an ongoing problem.

However they are not in bronze and iron keeping you from climbing, sorry bro.

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=0000000200010001000000000001,timestamp=2019-08-25T16:26:30.169+0000)

agreed they are in silver and gold by the tons lol i just got to gold this season

*cough* I go to plat to smurf like 85-90% of the time, and the other 10% is playing flex with people in silver/gold.  

You know why people would go to plat to smurf?  Let me tell you.  To practice.  because Normals is a joke to practice in.  The matchmaking in normals is complete trash, you can't practice there where someone is going to int and ruin the actual learning period.  

Where as in plat, people are all trying to get to diamond.  So you know that they are playing seriously.  Plus it lets you determine your skill on said champion.  

maybe ask a smurf before you make random statements.  I can promise you, that everyone has been in your shoes.  Guess what everyone that has gotten to higher elo has done.  Gotten better, while having to deal with smurfs.

i have high elo friends that smurf yes.so telling to ask a smurf before making random statements is luls.im not bitching about the fact that there are smurfs i just think its hilarious when someone tries to act like it isnt an issue.and yes i get it you need to practice or whatever but when u are working your way through the lower ranks you ruin games as well as boost ppl to where they dont need to be and that is a major problem u guys all complain about.ya know? boosted ppl in diamond or higher.in silver most times the smurf dictates the way the game will go and its a snoozefest when u recognize it.keep it up tho and all there will be left in low elo is high elo alt accounts lol man that sounds like fun!

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=bronzeadclife

here you go i can show you my chicks acct as well i got placed with her same placements we were put in b3 or 4 our first game then after that we pretty much lost everything kept putting us vs golds even though we were placed in bronze.

"Kept putting us vs golds"

Hmm....interesting...
No, 100% fresh accounts are placed in Iron. Riot said that at the start of the season when introducing the new ranks.

that is honestly not true the way mmr works it has to have a iddle ground where everyone starts which is around bronze-silver for the most part and then you can lose or gain. it is difficult as hell to drop into iron and jesus bronze is horrible lol everyone afks or just rage quits at 5 mins. my experience on a fresh smurf acct is bronze 3 or 4 as a start in ranked and after placements with about a 15%wr give or take i only lose 7lp per loss gain about 30 for a win. so realistically its made for you not to fall into bronze.

Riot can say whatever they want lmfao.

A new account starts silver 1 gold 4.
This account is a fresh account and was placed s3 after losing a majority of my placements. Sukishoo, you're incorrect and dumb for insisting that your misinformed self is correct.
I started a new account and was placed iron after one match. So you keep living in a fantasy

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=0000000200010000,timestamp=2019-08-24T21:24:50.849+0000)

Fresh accounts are placed in iron with name only, their MMR starts in silver and rapidly changes depending on win or lose since its a fresh account.

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-24T07:27:46.401+0000)

not true, most smurfs get into bronze/silver because there are the most players, riot needs to fix higher elo, all they do is winswap, which is another reason why they go to bronze/silver, to actually play the game.

That actually makes no sense what you are saying.

If a new account plays ranked for the first time it will be in a high silver low gold game, this is not rocket science this is a a fact.

It would take losing 10+ games to get into bronze, and by that time you can automatically assume that it is not a smurf, it is a bad player.

Also nobody is intentionally going to put themselves through terrible games getting constantly flamed all game long just to feed their ego in a low bronze game once they finally get there after losing 10+. It does not happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-24T21:15:52.928+0000)

so they start a new account to get into high elo again? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
they smurf to stay in bronze and silver to actually play the game, and getting into bronze isn't hard, with all the inters, especially in promos, riot just needs to fix high elo, and stop keeping players as much as possible in bronze and silver, riot is using inters to keep you playing as much as possible, they know high elo is a mess atm, they don't want more challengers either, if everyone becomes an challenger it will lose its edge, it no longer would be special.

??????

I have had tons of smurfs, I have never been below gold. Your delusion of players purposefully running it down mid to get to bronze is a fantasy.

Ovr and over

Silver mostly.

Smurf Ruin Rank completely.

Lets make everyone in the 1st-4th Grade be graded on a Bell with 8th-12th graders in their class.

Although noone enjoys smurfs
The reason they exist is cuz they want to dominate certain elo and play the game on an easy mode since they are where they wanted to be on their main
Which actually gives Riot more active accounts, that could potentially lead to a smurf buying skins for the champ they main, which means money, which means Riot = happy

How exactly do you fix an issue like that?
They cannot even come up with a fair punishment system

I wouldn't be surprised if the matchmaking is actually made to work as it should, but due to so many smurfs and trolls it cannot determine the MMR properly and matches you with lower elo by mistake

Do not hate on me this is just my opinion and a bit of frustration leaving my head

im sure it does screw up the mmr system badly that is why solo q is a joke.theres no possible way to even tell if you really did improve or you just got lucky in that win streak or promos.games still feel coinflip as hell and its got to the point where its boring when i see one of them on enemy team or even my own team.what fun is it really to play against people that have no chance.im used to it by now been playing this game casually for a long time and know riot wont do anything about the issue but it is funny to see soo many posts about it.

Smurfs don't exist in Bronze.

It's mainly Gold and Platinum that's infested with Smurfs.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-08-24T18:51:09.237+0000)

They're in all ranks, they tank to wherever they want then artificially 50% win rate with stomp/trolling.

So are we just going to ignore the fact that you believe there are players tanking to smurf level status in every game?

Seriously think about the delusion of players purposefully playing bad to lose for one second, it doesn't happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-08-24T21:46:00.606+0000)

It's about a relaxing game, having fun, farming JG or whatever, chilling. Stomping anyone that talks crap to you, then winning other games by just stomping while chilling. It's really freaking common my dude. Even gold players smurf in the depths.

Getting constantly flamed and pinged by teammates is not relaxing.

AFKing jg creeps is not relaxing.

Also you are really steering far from the point of their being smurfs rampant in every game.

i feel its really bad in silver and gold especially.all these hi elo players that stream....what do you think they are doing? they always on smurfs.go see for yourself nobody actually plays in the elo they are supposed to be in.they just churn out these smurf accounts for luls and views.

I mean how else do you make a video for  OMG BUSTED!!!!! NEW BUILD ON RAKA 100% CRITS SO OP WTF RITO IS DUMB BROKEN META

Imo, rule of thumb. If you open a Video and you get
HEEEELOOOOOOOOO EVERBODY...  
Leave.

The high elo smurfs the streamers use are literally all in plat+.

You can not find me one streamer that is actually using a bronze or iron account.

dude! since u want so badly to be right here ya go,https://www.twitch.tv/karasmai its like you dont play the same game as everyone else or something.i thought it was common knowledge

It's seems pathetic to want to smash players you know are worse than you. How bad must your self-confidence be if you enjoy doing that? What is the point of leveling up another account? You already know you can do it. It hurts the game for everyone. If you are that bored, go find something else to do.

> [{quoted}](name=SammyDayspring,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ec5ttuvA,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-08-25T02:55:52.246+0000)

You already know you can do it. It hurts the game for everyone. If you are that bored, go find something else to do.

thats whats hilarious when the excuses fly out about "muh practice" yea right.its all about not being mentally capable of losing so why not just play against players u cant lose to makes sense right? all these high elo players bitch that their elo is all screwed up but yet they come down to the depths to demoralize a bunch of new/bad players.some of the most carebear coward shit ive seen in gaming.no risk and no reward
Riot doesn't care. Smurfs are potential sales figures increasing.

This is true and this is why I feel Riot sells accounts and Scripting tools.  It makes more accounts that may buy skins and they get their cut from the "Bannable" Sales.  Classic move by the country they operate under.
